definitions.definition: A unit of thirty to forty soldiers typically commanded by a lieutenant and forming part of a company .
A subdivision of a fire company , led by a captain or lieutenant .
A group of self-driving vehicles travelling in a close convoy and communicating electronically with each other.
A group of children in the platoon grouping education system.

main_definition: ( military ) A unit of thirty to forty soldiers typically commanded by a lieutenant and forming part of a company .
secondary_definitions: A subdivision of a fire company , led by a captain or lieutenant .
A group of self-driving vehicles travelling in a close convoy and communicating electronically with each other.
( education , historical ) A group of children in the platoon grouping education system.
